body.name: HIMMLINE Queen Mattress, 10 Inch Hybrid Mattress, Gel Memory Foam and Pocket Spring Queen Bed Mattress in a Box, Medium Feel, Cooler Sleep & Pressure Relief, 60”*80”, 120 Nights Risk-Free Trial
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Motion Isolation & Edge Support】HIMMLINE Hybrid Mattress is supported by hundreds of individual pocket springs, which can absorb partner movement and relieve pressure. Will not sink over time.
【Multilayered Comfort Design】Gel memory foam ensures comfort and cooling. Comfort and supportive foam provide a cozy feel. The mattress bottom has a non-slip and breathable layer for stability.

【3D Knit Fabric & Cooling Sleep】Himmline 10 inch queen size mattress features breathable and skin-friendly 3D soft knit fabric. Promote effective air circulation and heat dissipation. Create a cool and cozy sleep.

【CertiPUR-US Certified & Eco-Friendly】Himmline Mattress is certified by CertiPUR-US. It is free from harmful substances like formaldehyde, mercury, and other heavy metals. Ideal for all sleep positions and bed frames.

【120-Day RISK-FREE Trial & 10-Year Warranty】The Himmline mattress offers a 120-day risk-free trial period, giving you the freedom to decide whether the mattress is suitable for you. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Himmline Customer Support Team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money and more
reviews.reviewText: This mattress came vacuum sealed and in a small box but we were amazed at how quickly it went into shaped and so comfy. It looks amazing with our new bed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slept better than I have in years.
reviews.reviewText: I consider a mattress a big purchase and I researched and read reviews, and frankly agonized over it, and chose this mattress. I also invested in a mattress topper. It was easy to set up. Expanded quickly and since we don’t have another bed we slept on it that night. I usually wake up several times a night I guess because I was uncomfortable but now I sleep straight through. I’m not going to say I wake up pain free, but I have a lot less aches and pains. It’s just the right amount of softness and firmness for me and my husband. He’s a back sleeper and I’m a side sleeper. As far as sitting on the edge of bed, I can see where that might be an issue if you’re used to doing that but I don’t usually do that so it hasn’t been an issue. It is without a doubt the most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept on and my husband has praised my research efforts after selecting this bed. I realize everyone is different and this mattress might not work for everyone, but I couldn’t be happier with my choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: low price wt good quality.I bought this mattresses for kids. It is affordable price with comfortable mattresses. I highly recommend this for the one who is looking mattress that need short time and you do not want to spend too much money. Especially it is perfect for the kids bunk bed and AR. Shipping is also supper speedy. It came the next day delivery and I was not expecting that. Box was in good condition and there was no any damages. They innerspring perfect mattress for love ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you’re looking for a firm comfortable mattress, this is a great option
reviews.reviewText: I’m positive it’s a great bed for a person preferring a firm mattress, as it is comfortable but, I prefer a soft mattress so I attempted to return, but you can’t return the item back in the box, however the company reached out to me and provided excellent customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: Was great to see it expand after opening inner plastic cover. Cut 2" slit and it expanded to 10" in seconds. Very comfortable, a good buy! Straps on side very handy to move it around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort/ Great quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We are amazed with the quality of the mattress. To begin with, I find it incredible that it comes vacuum sealed and that when you open it you can immediately see that the mattress takes its shape, the instructions indicate that you have to wait 72 hours for it to take its shape, and so we did. After a few days of using the mattress, we were simply fascinated by its quality, it is soft but firm. It helps with posture and favors the back, avoiding pain the next day. It is a high mattress and has handles to hold it when moving it from the bed, which makes it easier to transport. We recommend it 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bed sinks, little support
reviews.reviewText: After reading all the reviews, I decided to purchase this item. I really wanted something that was supportive and comfortable. This bed does offer some support and comfort, but overall still does sink when laid on. I am a side sleeper, and I can’t stand feeling like I am sinking into a hole. You can also really feel the springs when it sinks. I did like the outer rim, it definitely keeps the bed sheet on securely. But overall, my main focus was getting a bed that had enough support to NOT sink. And this was not it for me.I will update in a few weeks, and see if maybe ive changed my thoughts on this!Update : after a month of having this item, the bed now feels better. But it still is on the FIRM FIRM side. I added a topper on the bed for some cushion and it definitely helped!! Would recommend just be aware this is a FIRM bed.The seller also reached out and provided awesome customer service after seeing my review. Would definitely recommend trying it out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
